channel.title: Luzoxpk Reopening 317 P'king server || Skills Available || Bossing for Pkpoints
channel.description:
Banner Coming Soon
Download Client [url=http://www.luzoxpk.net/luzoxpk.jar]Click Here[/url] Webclient [url=http://www.luzoxpk.net/webclient]Click Here[/url] Website [url=http://www.luzoxpk.net]Click Here[/url] Forums [url=http://www.luzoxpk.net/forums/index.php?action=forum]Click Here[/url] Vote [url=http://www.luzoxpk.net/vote]Click Here[/url]
[SIZE=6]Luzoxpk Features[/SIZE]
[spoiler=Minigames] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/9tdatg.jpg[/img]
Some minigames to fill your time with.
[ul][*] Funpk [*] Fight pits [*] Custom minigames coming soon[/ul]
Some media of the Minigames
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/9e683bbb2bb3e782fb7f7b7c32cebf20.png[/img]
[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Skills] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/30k4zkk.jpg[/img]
Skilling is a big part of our community get your own supplies and skill ofcourse there are a few supplies in the store to start with but do you want better supplies get them yourself, this is also a way to support our market with.
[ul][*] Woodcutting with nests [*] Runecrafting travel with talismans [*] Farming plant seeds grow trees. [*] Herblore [*] Many more skills we simply don't list down everything.[/ul]
Some media of the Skilling
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/dc6e57fcef77e0ac952be455c2731b25.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/d22ce9e7f18960fdadac7cd11c699d17.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Player vs Monster] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2afa69g.jpg[/img]
Pvm is a big part of our server train at easy monsters loot there loots and sell it to fellow players/general store to make our server a real community.
[ul][*] Apes [*] Bears [*] And many more monsters.[/ul]
Some media of the Players vs monsters
Both monsters have a rare chance of droping "[COLOR="#008000"]dragon claws[/COLOR]"
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/83e545e62ccb92a9945440760e8e496f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/cf3a574b6efe336ad340c1c2a2e0b896.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Bossing] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2zeknyx.png[/img]
Bossing is a verry good way to earn a bank with, You can fight easy bosses but also strong bosses to gain better rewards.
[ul][*] Giant Mole [*] Dagannoth Kings [*] Kalphite Queen [*] Chaos elemental [*] And many more.[/ul]
Some media of the Bosses
Example of a strong boss with better rewards,
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/46fc6a4ca11ff464f0d647073ca4377c.png[/img]
Example of a easy boss with Decent rewards,
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/bf1797cfe9dfb354e6242bbfe17e59b3.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Misc] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/amv11z.png[/img]
Misc part is nothing more then features that i will list here.
[ul][*] Overloads. [*] Flasks. [*] Completionist cape. [*] Tokhaar-kal. [*] Account secuirity. [*] listing more later.[/ul]
Media coming soon [/spoiler]

item.title: Luzoxpk Reopening 317 P'king server || Skills Available || Bossing for Pkpoints
item.dc:creator: @luzoxpk luzoxpk
item.description:
@luzoxpk wrote:

Banner Coming Soon

Download Client Click Here
Webclient Click Here
Website Click Here
Forums Click Here
Vote Click Here

[SIZE=6]Luzoxpk Features[/SIZE]

[spoiler=Minigames]

Some minigames to fill your time with.

[ul][] Funpk
[] Fight pits
[*] Custom minigames coming soon[/ul]

Some media of the Minigames

[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Skills]

Skilling is a big part of our community get your own supplies and skill ofcourse there are a few supplies in the store to start with but do you want better supplies get them yourself, this is also a way to support our market with.

[ul][] Woodcutting with nests
[] Runecrafting travel with talismans
[] Farming plant seeds grow trees.
[] Herblore
[*] Many more skills we simply don’t list down everything.[/ul]

Some media of the Skilling


[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Player vs Monster]

Pvm is a big part of our server train at easy monsters loot there loots and sell it to fellow players/general store to make our server a real community.

[ul][] Apes
[] Bears
[*] And many more monsters.[/ul]

Some media of the Players vs monsters

Both monsters have a rare chance of droping “[COLOR=”#008000"]dragon claws[/COLOR]"


[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Bossing]

Bossing is a verry good way to earn a bank with, You can fight easy bosses but also strong bosses to gain better rewards.

[ul][] Giant Mole
[] Dagannoth Kings
[] Kalphite Queen
[] Chaos elemental
[*] And many more.[/ul]

Some media of the Bosses

Example of a strong boss with better rewards,

[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Misc]

Misc part is nothing more then features that i will list here.

[] Flasks.
[] Completionist cape.
[] Tokhaar-kal.
[] Account secuirity.
[] listing more later.[/ul]

Media coming soon
